alert.note: Alert for Northern Clinton; Northern Lycoming; Southern Clinton; Southern Lycoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 6:21PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN LYCOMING AND SOUTHEASTERN CLINTON COUNTIES THROUGH 700 PM EDT... At 621 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lock Haven, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Lock Haven, Jersey Shore, Carroll, Mill Hall, Avis, Dunnstown, Flemington, Castanea, McElhattan, Elimsport, Collomsville, Loganton, Oval and Lock Haven University. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for central and north central Pennsylvania.

area.areaDesc: Northern Clinton; Northern Lycoming; Southern Clinton; Southern Lycoming
